reviewText:
I watched this on reccomendation from a friend. I had never seen a Turkish film, and normally don't watch romance movies.

I am glad I gave this a shot, and now suggest it to anyone who will listen. I just wish there were easier ways to get it in the USA. No movie has impacted me so strongly in a long time. It deals with some pretty heavy topics such as love and mental health, and does so well.
